R.zh_des: 朋友不会让朋友做某些类型的数据可视化--它们是什么，为什么它们不好。
R.name: cxli233 /FriendsDontLetFriends
R.description: Friends don't let friends make certain types of data visualization - What are they and why are they bad.

R.zh_des: 统计反思(2024年版)目的格式日历和主题大纲编码家庭作业和解决方案讲师：Richard McElreath讲课：上传和预先录制，每周两次讨论：在线(Zoom)，星期五下午3点至4点中欧(柏林)时间本课程教授数据分析，但它侧重于科学模型
R.name: rmcelreath /stat_rethinking_2024
R.description: Statistical Rethinking (2024 Edition)PurposeFormatCalendar & Topical OutlineCodingHomework and solutionsInstructor: Richard McElreathLectures: Uploaded and pre-recorded, two per weekDiscussion: Online (Zoom), Fridays 3pm-4pm Central European (Berlin) TimeThis course teaches data analysis, but it focuses on scientific models
